channel.title: julien on Julien Chien
channel.description: Recent content in julien on Julien Chien

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Hi everyone, this is my personal website. This will hopefully become the center of my internet presence. I will be writing about things I’ve learned, which could be as simple as summaries, to more complex and “original” things like my thoughts and reflections. There will hopefully be a bookshelf / book summaries section, where I summarize and review books. I will probably write about coding related stuff as well, but I’m not yet sure if it should have its own section.

item.title: Hi!
item.description: I’m Julien Chien, nice to meet you! Currently based in San Francisco, where I work at a startup. Previously, I’ve lived and studied in Shanghai and the Los Angeles area. I am passionate about tech, economics, running, football (soccer), communities & how they work, urbanism & cities, and internet phenomena. Drop me a line at hello@julienchien.com or on Twitter !
